job_tasks.phrase: Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly indicates the need to understand business operations and implement strategic improvements.

job_tasks.phrase: Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape.
job_tasks.justification: This describes understanding customer business needs and aligning the solution with them.

job_tasks.phrase: Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations.
job_tasks.justification: This involves the practical implementation and integration of the company's solution, which is a software development-related task.

job_tasks.phrase: Improving our customer service practices and support tools.
job_tasks.justification: This points to understanding and improving business processes and tools related to customer service.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
job_tasks.justification: This involves defining and using metrics to improve business services and customer outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
job_tasks.justification: This shows a focus on business process improvement and solution enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools.
job_tasks.justification: This describes managing and improving business-related tools and strategies for customer success.

job_tasks.phrase: Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions innovation in support processes and looking for new technologies, indicating a business-focused improvement drive.

soft_skills.phrase: Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.
An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on business understanding, customer success, and improving customer service operations. While 'generative AI' is mentioned as a technology to explore, it's not central to the core responsibilities. The role is primarily business- and customer-focused, not a technical AI engineering role.
